author: Epic Games
description:
► Purchase Borderlands 4 now: https://epic.gm/borderlands4

Borderlands 4 is here, and fans & critics are losing their minds! Watch the Official Accolades Trailer for Borderlands 4 - available now on the Epic Games Store! 💥 

--------------------------------------------

Borderlands 4 is a mayhem-fueled looter shooter, jam-packed with billions of weapons, outrageous enemies, and intense co-op action. Explore a dangerous hidden planet Kairos as one of four new badass Vault Hunters.

Break free from the oppressive Timekeeper, a ruthless dictator who dominates the masses from on high. Now, a world-altering catastrophe threatens his perfect Order, unleashing mayhem across the planet. Ignite a resistance and blast your way through mechanical monstrosities, bloodthirsty bandits, and vicious beasts, with new traversal mechanics like: double jumping, gliding, dodging, fixed-point grappling, and more.

Fight solo or in co-op with up to three other players in this immense sci-fi adventure, pack
title: Borderlands 4 | Official Accolades Trailer

author: Epic Games
description: The next evolution of skate.™ is here in Early Access. Experience improved Flick-It controls, rich physics based gameplay, & off-board exploration in the multiplayer world of San Vansterdam. https://epic.gm/skate
title: skate.™ - Early Access Launch Trailer

author: Epic Games
description:
The ultimate tactical extraction shooter is here! Arena Breakout: Infinite full release is available now! Conquer five massive maps with dynamic weather in 4v4, Duos, Special Ops, or Solo Ops. Master the new Trophy Room 2.0 for progression and crafting.

Play for free: https://epic.gm/ab-infinite
title: Arena Breakout Infinite | Launch Trailer
